title: Micromax Canvas 81 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart TV  (32 Canvas 3)

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV-1N, User Manual- 1N, Remote Control- 1N, Batteries(AAA)- 2N, Wall Mount- 1N, Stand Base- 2N
product_specification.Sound Technology: Class D Amp With Stereo Digital Processing
product_specification.Other Power Features: Maximum Withstand Input Voltage: Less Than 310 V AC
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.A+ Grade Panel - For Vivid Visuals: This television screen is equipped with a zero bright dot panel which paves the way for vivid visuals, thereby making your viewing experience more real.
product_description.Inbuilt Box Speakers - For Clear Sound: This television's inbuilt box speakers will elevate your television viewing experience with clear and amplified sound.

first of all, i trust the brand micromax as it was my first smartphone, now im also having another 32 inch tv..working fine for the past 2 years, as such i again buy another one last day.. today it got deliver, took only 2 days....super value for money..nice buy, excellent picture excellent internet connectivity, fully recomended to budjet tv lovers, hotstar connectivity has some issues. completely loved the tv ,considering to buy the next model from micromax. satisfied customer...will update if any issues happen.
Though I did not hv entertaining its smart features like internet connection, and using basic features only.. but it looks good so far.

All Things are good. Worth Of money .

This is very nice TV. Just wanted to say this is best Smart TV in terms of cost.
Screen quality - Awesome.
Volume - I can't raise more then 15/100 . Trust me guys if you will raise more then 50% your neighbors will shout on you. :)
Wifi connectivity.
Bit Slow in operating from remote control but you we can operate remote by your phone you will love it.
Many app which you download from net will be compatible with this TV. (I meant you say you will not get error message)

Delivery was on time.
Installation was on time.
Installation guy was very well behaved. (best thing was he said that " If you face any difficulties you can call me and he gave his number"). this was really convening me.

Thanks to flipkart.

One thing I want to say, it is value for money. Connectivity is fine, mobile casting is OK. prime videos are running properly.
But the services is very poor, installation has taken approx one week and as per commitment, they should visit as per my convenient timing but no they came for installation after several complains and have't provided any demo as I was not available there.
If they have provided such a pathetic service for installation, imagine if I need service then what would happen!!

Even Youtube video is not working properly, sometimes it works fine but sometimes it asks to update and then got hanged.

Made good for the price. Do not expect a Bravia OLED, but a good tv for this price. Casting could be improved slightly as you cannot play videos streaming on the internet seamlessly from your phone. You have to download the video first to you phone and then mirror screen to play on the tv screen.

Excellent 3 day delivery by flipkart and 1 day installation by micromax. Tv is good given the price in this segment. Aptoid is very similar as an appstore as android and contains all the required apps one needs for the tv. Overall a good value for money product by Micromax.

very good picture quality (use HD STB for best experience) , sound is very good, it has WiFi, hotspot, HDMI, Rgb, VGA, USB ports. Easy to use interference, software is good, you can install apps from app Store and manually too. screen cast works perfect, nice design.
Delivery was on time, installation from jevees was also good and installation person was polite.
best at this price range, better than MI and Thomson.

good for a budget TV but can't compare on standard of smart TVs..here are certain cons

1. it doesn't play hd videos .it says though hd ready and should be able to play 720p videos but quality sucks and looks animated

2. most of the app's do not work or either crash while using .

3. screen resolution automatically shrinks to small ..you playing content will shrink small automatically ..you have to restart TV to get back to full screen mode.

4. while playing videos online, screen flashes automatically which is very annoying...

bottom line ....it's good for those who have less budget and want to showcase that they own smart TV but if you really wanna enjoy smart TV , buy Sony , LG or other brands with bit higher costs .

Pros: Good picture quality, good sound, smooth functioning, supports netflix, youtube, vlc player, aptoide store(from where we can download apps for Micromax tv), you can do screen mirroring or play video, mp3 ,photos from mobile
*Open hotspot in tv
*connect your mobile with that hotspot
*open micromax canvas plus app(for mirroring you need to download Mi canvas plus application from play store)
*now you can play video , music and photos from your to your tv wirelessly.

Cons: In screen mirroring, sound comes from mobile speaker and not the tv speaker but still you play videos with tv speaker without any problem and without mirroring using mi canvas plus app. This problem may be fixed with future updates.

A value for money product (I got it @12999 during big billion days)
Go for it over mi tv no doubt and afterall it is an indian brand
At the range of INR 12999, it is quite good and awesome. Picture quality and sound both are up to mark, just go for it.
